org.apache.ambari.server.customactions

Class ActionDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.customactions.ActionDefinition

  • public class ActionDefinition
extends Object
    The resource describing the definition of an action

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionDefinition

        public ActionDefinition(String actionName,
                        ActionType actionType,
                        String inputs,
                        String targetService,
                        String targetComponent,
                        String description,
                        TargetHostType targetType,
                        Integer defaultTimeout,
                        Set<RoleAuthorization> permissions)
        Create an instance of ActionDefinition
        Parameters:
        actionName - The name of the action
        actionType - The type fo the action
        inputs - Expected input of the action
        targetService - Target service type (e.g. HDFS)
        targetComponent - Target component type (e.g. DATANODE)
        description - Short description of the action
        targetType - Selection criteria for target hosts
        defaultTimeout - The timeout value for this action when executed
        permissions - A set of permissions to use when verifiying authorization to execute this action
